adjectives.description: pacifist (comparative more pacifist, superlative most pacifist)

entries.meaning: One who loves, supports, or favours peace.
examples: Mahatma Gandhi was one of the world's most famous pacifists.

entries.meaning: One who prefers to avoid violence.
One who opposes violence and is anti-war.
examples: No matter what pacifist "flubdubs and flapdoodle mollycoddles" might say, the President [Teddy Roosevelt] knew that if there were a general war then America could well be drawn into it.

entries.meaning: (video games, roguelikes) A player who attempts the challenge of winning a game without attacking any enemy characters.
